original_title: Sackcloth and Greasepaint: The Story of Script for a Jester's Tear
overview: A documentary which covers the formation of the band through to the release of Script For A Jester’s Tear in 1983 – including interviews with Fish, Mark Kelly, Diz Minnit, Mick Pointer, Steve Rothery, Pete Trewavas and Mark Wilkinson.
title: Sackcloth and Greasepaint: The Story of Script for a Jester's Tear
